snippet: Bank of America’s fourth-quarter results exceeded Wall Street expectations. | Doctor admits sharing data with former SAC trader accused of insider trading. | Regulators revise Volcker Rule. | Michael Lewis has a new book.

headline.main: Good News for Bank of America
